Ths "For people who attack constantly and get this before they can make (Ths) 8 Mm on each flank results in 2 casualties(Jonaman123 USA1 IN1)"
Alternatively, 8 Mm front and right, with 2 stairs on right results in no casualities (RicksGamer INT1)
"Ths should be Sm (Peacekeeper USA1)"(Ths) = Sm I attack with 6 Sm = 16w, 19s, 52f, 210g, NO rubies

The Keep/Courtyard

Your attack formation to defeat the castle:

Left flank tools Front tools Right flank tools
6 Ladd - -
Left flank troops Front troops Right flank troops
9 Ths 23 Hc -
Troops lost -
Due to a bug in the game, if you use a commander that has a ranged bonus but not a melee bonus you will lose 1 Ths on the left flank. Send 10 Ths instead to lose -.
Ladd's are slow and expensive to make when you are building heavily. I prefer to add a Sp in first wave to use up Tp, it's just 30 coins and ready in 20 seconds.
